message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $135. It's a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $135. How about we meet in the middle at $125?
I'm getting close to the minimum I'm willing to sell for, Bob. I can do $130, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a great deal for you!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $125?
